changeSet.author: root
changeSet.sql: CREATE SCHEMA IF NOT EXISTS `motor_depot` DEFAULT CHARACTER SET utf8 ; USE `motor_depot` ;

changeSet.author: root
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `motor_depot`.`address` ( `id` INT(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `country` VARCHAR(45) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `region` VARCHAR(45) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `locality` VARCHAR(45) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `street` VARCHAR(45) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `building` VARCHAR(45) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `apartment` VARCHAR(45) NULL DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE INDEX `id_UNIQUE` (`id` ASC) ) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8;

changeSet.author: root
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `motor_depot`.`automobile_type` ( `id` INT(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `type` VARCHAR(45) NULL DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE INDEX `id_UNIQUE` (`id` ASC) ) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8;

changeSet.author: root
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `motor_depot`.`fuel` ( `id` INT(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `type` VARCHAR(45) NULL DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE INDEX `id_UNIQUE` (`id` ASC) ) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8;

changeSet.author: root
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `motor_depot`.`technical_status` ( `id` INT(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `status` VARCHAR(125) NULL DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE INDEX `id_UNIQUE` (`id` ASC) ) ENGINE = InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT = 4 DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8;

changeSet.author: root
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `motor_depot`.`automobile` ( `id` VARCHAR(12) NOT NULL, `brand` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL, `model` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL, `type_id` INT(11) NOT NULL, `fuel_type_id` INT(11) NOT NULL, `carrying` INT(11) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `platform_length` INT(11) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `platform_width` INT(11) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `cargo_height_limit` DECIMAL(10,0) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `cargo_volume_limit` DECIMAL(10,0) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `technical_status_id` INT(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE INDEX `id_UNIQUE` (`id` ASC) , INDEX `fk_automobile_fuel1_idx` (`fuel_type_id` ASC) , INDEX `fk_automobile_automobile_type1_idx` (`type_id` ASC) , INDEX `fk_automobile_technical_status1_idx` (`technical_status_id` ASC) , CONSTRAINT `fk_automobile_automobile_type1` FOREIGN KEY (`type_id`) REFERENCES `motor_depot`.`automobile_type` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT `fk_automobile_fuel1` FOREIGN KEY (`fuel_type_id`) REFERENCES `motor_depot`.`fuel` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT `fk_automobile_technical_status1` FOREIGN KEY (`technical_status_id`) REFERENCES `motor_depot`.`technical_status` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8;

changeSet.author: root
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `motor_depot`.`role` ( `id` INT(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` VARCHAR(45) NULL DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE INDEX `id_UNIQUE` (`id` ASC) ) ENGINE = InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT = 4 DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8;

changeSet.author: root
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `motor_depot`.`user_status` ( `id` INT(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `status` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8;

changeSet.author: root
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `motor_depot`.`user` ( `id` INT(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` VARCHAR(125) NOT NULL, `surname` VARCHAR(125) NOT NULL, `login` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL, `password` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL, `role_id` INT(11) NOT NULL, `status_id` INT(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE INDEX `id_UNIQUE` (`id` ASC) , INDEX `fk_user_role1_idx` (`role_id` ASC) , INDEX `fk_user_status_idx` (`status_id` ASC) , CONSTRAINT `fk_user_role1` FOREIGN KEY (`role_id`) REFERENCES `motor_depot`.`role` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT `fk_user_status` FOREIGN KEY (`status_id`) REFERENCES `motor_depot`.`user_status` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8; ALTER TABLE `motor_depot`.`user` ADD UNIQUE INDEX `login_UNIQUE` (`login` ASC);

changeSet.author: root
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `motor_depot`.`automobile_attachment` ( `id` INT(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `automobile_id` VARCHAR(12) NOT NULL, `driver_id` INT(11) NOT NULL, `date_of_attachment` DATE NOT NULL, `date_of_detachment` DATE NULL DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), INDEX `fk_automobile_attachment_automobile1_idx` (`automobile_id` ASC) , INDEX `fk_automobile_attachment_user1_idx` (`driver_id` ASC) , CONSTRAINT `fk_automobile_attachment_automobile1` FOREIGN KEY (`automobile_id`) REFERENCES `motor_depot`.`automobile` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT `fk_automobile_attachment_user1` FOREIGN KEY (`driver_id`) REFERENCES `motor_depot`.`user` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION) ENGINE = InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT = 3 DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8;

changeSet.author: root
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `motor_depot`.`equipment` ( `id` INT(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` VARCHAR(125) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `description` VARCHAR(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE INDEX `id_UNIQUE` (`id` ASC) ) ENGINE = InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT = 4 DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8;

changeSet.author: root
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `motor_depot`.`automobile_has_equipment` ( `equipment_id` INT(11) NOT NULL, `automobile_id` VARCHAR(12) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`equipment_id`, `automobile_id`), INDEX `fk_equipment_has_automobile_automobile1_idx` (`automobile_id` ASC) , INDEX `fk_equipment_has_automobile_equipment1_idx` (`equipment_id` ASC) , CONSTRAINT `fk_equipment_has_automobile_automobile1` FOREIGN KEY (`automobile_id`) REFERENCES `motor_depot`.`automobile` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT `fk_equipment_has_automobile_equipment1` FOREIGN KEY (`equipment_id`) REFERENCES `motor_depot`.`equipment` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8;

changeSet.author: root
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `motor_depot`.`loading_type` ( `id` INT(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `loading_type` VARCHAR(45) NULL DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE INDEX `id_UNIQUE` (`id` ASC) ) ENGINE = InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT = 4 DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8;

changeSet.author: root
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `motor_depot`.`automobile_has_loading_type` ( `automobile_id` VARCHAR(12) NOT NULL, `loading_type_id` INT(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`automobile_id`, `loading_type_id`), INDEX `fk_automobile_has_loading_type_loading_type1_idx` (`loading_type_id` ASC) , INDEX `fk_automobile_has_loading_type_automobile1_idx` (`automobile_id` ASC) , CONSTRAINT `fk_automobile_has_loading_type_automobile1` FOREIGN KEY (`automobile_id`) REFERENCES `motor_depot`.`automobile` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT `fk_automobile_has_loading_type_loading_type1` FOREIGN KEY (`loading_type_id`) REFERENCES `motor_depot`.`loading_type` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8;

changeSet.author: root
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `motor_depot`.`charterer` ( `id` INT(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` VARCHAR(125) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `surname` VARCHAR(125) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `own_address_id` INT(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE INDEX `id_UNIQUE` (`id` ASC) , INDEX `fk_charterer_address1_idx` (`own_address_id` ASC) , CONSTRAINT `fk_charterer_address1` FOREIGN KEY (`own_address_id`) REFERENCES `motor_depot`.`address` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8;

changeSet.author: root
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `motor_depot`.`execution_status` ( `id` INT(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` VARCHAR(45) NULL DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE INDEX `id_UNIQUE` (`id` ASC) ) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8;

changeSet.author: root
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `motor_depot`.`request` ( `id` INT(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `filling_date` DATE NOT NULL, `charterer_id` INT(11) NOT NULL, `required_automobile_type_id` INT(11) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `required_loading_type_id` INT(11) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `status_id` INT(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE INDEX `id_UNIQUE` (`id` ASC) , INDEX `fk_request_loading_type1_idx` (`required_loading_type_id` ASC) , INDEX `fk_request_automobile_type1_idx` (`required_automobile_type_id` ASC) , INDEX `fk_request_status1_idx` (`status_id` ASC) , INDEX `fk_request_charterer_idx` (`charterer_id` ASC) , CONSTRAINT `fk_request_automobile_type1` FOREIGN KEY (`required_automobile_type_id`) REFERENCES `motor_depot`.`automobile_type` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT `fk_request_charterer` FOREIGN KEY (`charterer_id`) REFERENCES `motor_depot`.`charterer` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT `fk_request_loading_type1` FOREIGN KEY (`required_loading_type_id`) REFERENCES `motor_depot`.`loading_type` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT `fk_request_status1` FOREIGN KEY (`status_id`) REFERENCES `motor_depot`.`execution_status` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8;

changeSet.author: root
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `motor_depot`.`delivery` ( `id` INT(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `loading_place_id` INT(11) NOT NULL, `loading_date` DATE NULL DEFAULT NULL, `destination_id` INT(11) NOT NULL, `term` DATE NULL DEFAULT NULL, `request_id` INT(11) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `status_id` INT(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE INDEX `id_UNIQUE` (`id` ASC) , INDEX `request_id` (`request_id` ASC) , INDEX `fk_delivery_status1_idx` (`status_id` ASC) , INDEX `fk_delivery_address1_idx` (`loading_place_id` ASC) , INDEX `fk_delivery_address2_idx` (`destination_id` ASC) , CONSTRAINT `delivery_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`request_id`) REFERENCES `motor_depot`.`request` (`id`), CONSTRAINT `fk_delivery_address1` FOREIGN KEY (`loading_place_id`) REFERENCES `motor_depot`.`address` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT `fk_delivery_address2` FOREIGN KEY (`destination_id`) REFERENCES `motor_depot`.`address` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT `fk_delivery_status1` FOREIGN KEY (`status_id`) REFERENCES `motor_depot`.`execution_status` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8;

changeSet.author: root
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `motor_depot`.`ride` ( `id` INT(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `date` DATE NULL DEFAULT NULL, `request_id` INT(11) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `dispatcher_id` INT(11) NOT NULL, `automobile_id` VARCHAR(12) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `loading_place_id` INT(11) NOT NULL, `loading_date` DATE NULL DEFAULT NULL, `destination_id` INT(11) NOT NULL, `term` DATE NULL DEFAULT NULL, `status_id` INT(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE INDEX `id_UNIQUE` (`id` ASC) , INDEX `automobile_id` (`automobile_id` ASC) , INDEX `fk_ride_user1_idx` (`dispatcher_id` ASC) , INDEX `fk_ride_status1_idx` (`status_id` ASC) , INDEX `fk_ride_address1_idx` (`loading_place_id` ASC) , INDEX `fk_ride_address2_idx` (`destination_id` ASC) , CONSTRAINT `fk_ride_address1` FOREIGN KEY (`loading_place_id`) REFERENCES `motor_depot`.`address` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT `fk_ride_address2` FOREIGN KEY (`destination_id`) REFERENCES `motor_depot`.`address` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT `fk_ride_status1` FOREIGN KEY (`status_id`) REFERENCES `motor_depot`.`execution_status` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT `fk_ride_user1` FOREIGN KEY (`dispatcher_id`) REFERENCES `motor_depot`.`user` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT `ride_ibfk_2` FOREIGN KEY (`automobile_id`) REFERENCES `motor_depot`.`automobile` (`id`)) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8;

changeSet.author: root
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `motor_depot`.`unit` ( `id` INT(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `type` VARCHAR(125) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `length` INT(11) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `width` INT(11) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `height` DECIMAL(10,0) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `weight` DECIMAL(10,0) NULL DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE INDEX `id_UNIQUE` (`id` ASC) ) ENGINE = InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT = 2 DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8;

changeSet.author: root
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `motor_depot`.`cargo` ( `id` INT(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` VARCHAR(125) NOT NULL, `unit_id` INT(11) NOT NULL, `delivery_id` INT(11) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `ride_id` INT(11) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `quantity` DECIMAL(10,0) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE INDEX `id_UNIQUE` (`id` ASC) , INDEX `delivery_id` (`delivery_id` ASC) , INDEX `fk_cargo_unit1_idx` (`unit_id` ASC) , INDEX `fk_cargo_ride1_idx` (`ride_id` ASC) , CONSTRAINT `cargo_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`delivery_id`) REFERENCES `motor_depot`.`delivery` (`id`), CONSTRAINT `fk_cargo_ride1` FOREIGN KEY (`ride_id`) REFERENCES `motor_depot`.`ride` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT `fk_cargo_unit1` FOREIGN KEY (`unit_id`) REFERENCES `motor_depot`.`unit` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION) ENGINE = InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT = 2 DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8;

changeSet.author: root
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `motor_depot`.`charterer_use_address` ( `charterer_id` INT(11) NOT NULL, `address_id` INT(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`charterer_id`, `address_id`), INDEX `fk_charterer_has_address_address1_idx` (`address_id` ASC) , INDEX `fk_charterer_has_address_charterer1_idx` (`charterer_id` ASC) , CONSTRAINT `fk_charterer_has_address_address1` FOREIGN KEY (`address_id`) REFERENCES `motor_depot`.`address` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT `fk_charterer_has_address_charterer1` FOREIGN KEY (`charterer_id`) REFERENCES `motor_depot`.`charterer` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8;

changeSet.author: root
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `motor_depot`.`maintenance` ( `id` INT(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `type` VARCHAR(125) NOT NULL, `start_time` DATE NULL DEFAULT NULL, `finish_time` DATE NULL DEFAULT NULL, `automobile_id` VARCHAR(12) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE INDEX `id_UNIQUE` (`id` ASC) , INDEX `fk_maintenance_automobile1_idx` (`automobile_id` ASC) , CONSTRAINT `fk_maintenance_automobile1` FOREIGN KEY (`automobile_id`) REFERENCES `motor_depot`.`automobile` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8;

changeSet.author: root
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `motor_depot`.`malfunction` ( `id` INT(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `problem` VARCHAR(225) NOT NULL, `detection_time` DATE NULL DEFAULT NULL, `fix_time` DATE NULL DEFAULT NULL, `automobile_id` VARCHAR(12) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE INDEX `id_UNIQUE` (`id` ASC) , INDEX `fk_malfunction_automobile1_idx` (`automobile_id` ASC) , CONSTRAINT `fk_malfunction_automobile1` FOREIGN KEY (`automobile_id`) REFERENCES `motor_depot`.`automobile` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8;

changeSet.author: root
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `motor_depot`.`request_has_required_equipment` ( `request_id` INT(11) NOT NULL, `equipment_id` INT(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`request_id`, `equipment_id`), INDEX `fk_request_has_equipment_equipment1_idx` (`equipment_id` ASC) , INDEX `fk_request_has_equipment_request1_idx` (`request_id` ASC) , CONSTRAINT `fk_request_has_equipment_equipment1` FOREIGN KEY (`equipment_id`) REFERENCES `motor_depot`.`equipment` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION, CONSTRAINT `fk_request_has_equipment_request1` FOREIGN KEY (`request_id`) REFERENCES `motor_depot`.`request` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION) ENGINE = InnoDB DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8;

changeSet.author: root
root
